about_the_game:
Odd Remedy is an online multiplayer action-adventure game in which you make your escape from a dangerous, abandoned island infested with monster spiders. Clear out and destroy the isolating dungeons, loot the island for tools and your survival, use your smartphones for communication and work together to complete objectives. Get ready to make your escape from the island with the secret boat attached to your car without the Blackfang Corp finding you. The island is at your disposal to reach your goals the way you want to, but it's new inhabitants will not allow you to feel safe at every turn.

TEAMWORK

While stealth is an option, against the hordes of spiders, your fellow prisoners are key to increase your chances of success. Work together, fight together.

SHARING IS CARING

Use your smartphones to call, text and share (relevant) photos. Be aware that your phones also make noise, sometimes attracting unwanted attention.

HOME SWEET PRISON

Collect (cool) items from your journeys and customize your prison workplace. Manage your inventory, craft (useful) stuff for your next journey or treat yourself.

Features:

  • Online multiplayer with up to 8 players

  • Interactive phone system (phone calls, messages, taking/sending photos)

  • Customizable player faces

  • Physics based interactions with objects and items

  • Interactive vehicle mechanics

  • Procedurally generated open-world island map (each run is different)

  • Collecting items and upgrading your base

  • Dynamic enemy behaviour

  • Proximity voice chat

  • Original soundtrack

Game Lore:

Blackfang Corp - a secret, government-backed military unit, running experiments on unique weapons and people in occupied, hidden areas. As tests on mutating spider monster species in the so called Hell Island were handled by underpaid and unmotivated workers, a dozen of spiders have unknowingly escaped the facility. The bugs were growing and multiplying in the forest for months, until they would eventually run out of resources, and begin flooding into the city. The emergency alarms were set on blast as many Blackfang workers escaped. Lacking further resources and desperate for a solution, they select a few prisoners to send on a remotely supervised mission. That's you, you are the odd remedy. What they don't know though, is that you have other plans.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
